website_summaries.verdict: Perfect option for those who need to protect money and other small items with a low priced bag.
pros: One of the least expensive fire protection bags you'll find
Compact enough that it'll fit inside a small safe comfortably
Resistant to both water and fire damage
Fiberglass exterior is coated with silicone to create a material that's safe to handle without needing gloves
cons: Size of only 10.5" x 6.9", so it's not made for letter size papers

customer_reviews.title: Great size for small important papers
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect in my hide a way spot. Great size for birth certificates, social security cards, titles, small diplomas, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Smokeswife14

customer_reviews.title: It burned through in 4 seconds! Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: Once I received these I noticed that the zipper is regular fabric, the zipper strap is regular plastic and polyester rope and the zipper not built tight to resist water! So decided to test for fireproofing with a simple lighter test and holding the lighter torch at 1/2" away, it smoked and melted through the inner layer in 4 seconds and inside felt very hot to touch! So, the fire proof rating on this bag is an absolute BS and huge disappointment. I have already purchased thirty larger bags too and will be fire testing them before getting it to anyone else! WILL BE RETURNING THIS ASAP. Picture below...
customer_reviews.author: Payam L.

customer_reviews.title: A useful holder for important documents and money
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a fireproof container to keep important documents and money in and this proved ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Agustin Burns

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Durable and the material on the inside isn’t scratch. Hope to never put it to the test but at least I know my important papers are stored hopefully in a safer pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Arelys

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly what I needed to keep my passport
customer_reviews.text: Recommend to buy since it's reasonable price with good quality, and no bad smell. I would purchase again when they have A4 size which will be for my important Document.
customer_reviews.author: YCC

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Not fire proof at all.
customer_reviews.text: This is not fire proof at all. We tested this in a campfire that was barely burning and it burned our documents immediately. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Young

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: I can't say that I know how it would perform in a fire. We use it for special documents as an added level of protection. Hope we never find out if it works. It seems to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EVERY HOME NEEDS THIS
customer_reviews.text: VERY GOOD TO KEEP PAPERS AND OTHER ITEMS THAT ARE NOT TWO BIG (THIS INCLUDES MONEY) AND RELIEVE YOUR WORRY THAT SOMETHING WILL HAPPEN IF THERE IS A FIRE. LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: Would not hold up in a house fire
customer_reviews.text: I held a bic lighter to it for 30 seconds it started to melt and burn. I really think all documents would be gone in a small short fire.
customer_reviews.author: Parker Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Unknown sleeve pocket material for pockets inside.
customer_reviews.text: Will be using this item for a few valubles plus storing inside a safe.
customer_reviews.author: O.D.

customer_reviews.title: product
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, very good product, keep all documents on safe, easy to use but a little bit heavy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not at all as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The only way I can see this having so many high reviews is if they are buying reviews. The zipper doesn't close 100% so water will get in, the bag itself is a flimsy cash bag that is nylon lined. Sending back for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for extra protection for your safe.
customer_reviews.text: When the Northern California fires hit, the fire victims thought their safes would keep their valuables water and fire safe. The fire was so intense and lasted for so long the safes were destroyed along, of course, with the contents. If you use these fireproof bags inside a "Fire Safe" then a cutting torch's heat MAY get through both.
customer_reviews.author: G C

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISEMENT!!
customer_reviews.text: VERY DISAPPOINTED!!! Not as big as the pictures make it seem!! An iPad would NOT fit in here!! And the lady holding it under her arm must be some sort of altered pic because it’s barely bigger than my hand!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Can't survive a lighter
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited at the thought of this product. I gave it the old lighter test and within 10-15 seconds my wife told me to stop as it was smoking and the end unraveled. Disappointing. Just like a water proof case for a phone, I would recommend testing it prior to putting faith in it. Nothing worse than realizing it failed when you needed it the most. Maybe there was a defect in the one I received. I don't know. However, in my testing, a birthday candle could give this product a run for its money never mind the flames in the pic the used for advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Coletti-Manning

customer_reviews.title: Right size
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of looking for a bag that was the right size I needed and flexible. This one fit the bill, there is a bit of an odor but not too bad. The price was reasonable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Wildflower

customer_reviews.title: Zipper area seems to be weak link in any fire protection bag
customer_reviews.text: I would be very hesitant to purchase this again, nor recommend this to a friend. I watched several videos - these bags just can't hold up to any direct fire. Me, I placed some important papers in this small bag and placed in my Fire Safe Box...I'm trusting this "double" system might help.
customer_reviews.author: Doog East TX

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: Love it and the pockets inside to keep money wraps for your paper money I keep mine in my safe . So nicely made I'm loving mine I got 2 one for hubby he likes to hide his money sometimes Like right now hes savein for a truck And thank God its fire proof For he almost lost his barn to a fire years ago .I can imagine what he was thinking while the Fire department was putting out the fire . We about lost everything the fire dont take long to get out of control.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I seriously DOUBT this will protect documents from fire
customer_reviews.text: I've looked at numerous youtube videos that put so-called Fireproof bags in a fire. The overwhelming consensus of these videos is UNFAVORABLE. None of the bags protected paper from burning to a crisp. I have no intention of using my bag to "protect" anything.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Cole

customer_reviews.title: VERY VERY BAD SMELL!!
customer_reviews.text: The Fireproof Money Safe Document Bag is made very well, I believe it would do the job that it is made for BUT...I put it in my safe and after 4 week it made everything in my safe smell very very bad. I even had to take my cash to the bank and exchange it for new bills. Had to clean you the safe and discard the Bag. Wish it would of worked out. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Safe and affordable
customer_reviews.text: A really good and affortable product, very good quality. I can put all my important documents in it to give me peice of mind in case of any emergency, that itll be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Jason T

customer_reviews.title: No padding at all, just a very thin bag
customer_reviews.text: Website says this contains fiberglass and is 0.7" thick. Actual product is just a very thin bag. Total thickness less than 1/8" Annoying to even think of having to send the thing back. What next? Empty boxes? If the product is meant only to be a extra slim bag, then the website is misleading. And if it isn't, their quality control is atrocious.
customer_reviews.author: Richard.

customer_reviews.title: A product and company that you can trust and depend on!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product!! I have great confidence in it and believe that it will protect my documents against fire. Also, after receiving it, I was notified by the company to verify that I had received it and when I said yes, they registered it for a Lifetime warranty. That's excellent customer service!! I couldn't be happier!! This is a product and company that you can trust and depend on!!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary R Rogers

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: It is resistant, it fits a lot of documents that I need to make sure they are safe. It is black and nice-looking, water and fire resistant as it says on the product description. Nothing to complain yet. It`s nice to know that all my documents are safe in the same place and in case of emergency they are gonna be easy to find.
customer_reviews.author: Keri Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Glorified pencil bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is definitely NOT waterproof. It’s just a regular zipper that doesn’t even seal all the way. The bag is also very uncomfortable to hold because it’s made out of a very sticky material. This bag also probably wouldn’t stand a chance in a fire. So the verdict is that it’s just a glorified pencil bag.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Extra protection
customer_reviews.text: I use this to store a hard drive and thumb drive in, also placed inside my fireproof safe, as 3 computers are backed up on the HD and the home inventory in on the thumb drive the more security the better. This is one of those things where you will never know if it works unless there is a fire, so you don't want to find out.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort in sevuring documents and other
customer_reviews.text: I have 3. Use it for storing my FX as we travel a lot, plus important documents and jewelry. Great idea, going to get a couple for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Tommie 65

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pouches
customer_reviews.text: These are nice. I have to assume they'll work obviously but they seem pretty durable and it gives me a little piece of mind knowing that I can protect some valuable in case there is ever a fire.
customer_reviews.author: 50Bubbles

customer_reviews.title: It's The Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: I needed a fireproof bag that would fit in my little safe. It's large enough for important documents folded to fit. The first one I purchased is too big for the safe but can hold folders of important docur.

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: It is resistant, it fits a lot of documents that I need to make sure they are safe. It`s nice to know that all my documents are safe in the same place and in case of emergency they are gonna be easy to find.

customer_reviews.title: Durable... happy!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the durable feel!! You can really feel, the resistance “treatment”, that’s been applied (for fire & water proofing). Happy with purchase!!!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Protection for Documents
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to store birth certificates and passports in that would protect them god forbid there was a fire or something in the house and this bag definitely does the job! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: hallie mattern

customer_reviews.title: Just as the description said,great!
customer_reviews.text: The description is consistent. To the touch the whole bag and zipper is soaked in some composition. In the fire she did not throw it, but 5-10 seconds held over the lighter, the fabric can withstand. About the water-you can not dive with it, through the zipper will quench, but the fabric itself, the water does not pass, so that rain or snow is not afraid of her. All in all, good product and can recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Wearden

customer_reviews.title: It holds money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to hold money, about the size of a bank bag, I unsure how fire resistant it truly is, and am hopeful to never find out.
customer_reviews.author: JWID

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This is well made. I tried it out with water and it is not water proof as water will come in through the zipper if submerged, but if water is splashed in it, it will keep the inside contents dry. Don’t know if it is fireproof but is a nice place to keep things like a portable hard drive, especially if traveling.
customer_reviews.author: LaTasha Jeter

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: This bag is really solid looking & feel. Hope it never has to be tested in a fire ! But material seems to be what it claims to be..

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job.
customer_reviews.text: So far I’ve had no complains. Holds my money like it should lol. Too early to tell as far as durability goes.

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Actually love these. They look really good. They worked out perfectly for what we needed. Love it, would buy again from this seller.

customer_reviews.title: Great, lightweight pouch!
customer_reviews.text: I have no way of testing the Fireproof claim for the pouch, but it works well for what I wanted - a pouch to store important papers and a little cash. Soft, easy to zip.
customer_reviews.author: Lori L.

customer_reviews.title: Great protective bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fireproof pouch! Perfect for our vital documents. With the recent increase in fires, tons of rain, and being in an earthquake zone, our family has been concerned about protecting our most important objects. We feel confident that they are safer as it's fireproof and waterproof.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for emergency kit
customer_reviews.text: Previously ordered this for myself and recently got this for my daughter in law. She is very happy with it - as am I! Perfect for their family emergency kit.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with product size, Water resistant material,
customer_reviews.text: So far so good what I like about these are they are a great dimension for a full-size document not legal documents but full-size great for storage for documents that need to be safe and secure able to label each zipper pocket to keep things in order water Resistance not waterproof because waterproof would enable them to be submerged I can’t see that happening with the zipper but not willing to try

They do not advertise as waterproof I don’t think, I have never submerged them in water, wouldn’t try that

product_meta.title: Fireproof Money Safe Document Bag. Non-Itchy Silicone Coated Fire & Water Resistant Safe Cash Bag. Fireproof Safe Storage for A5 Size File Folder Holder, Money, Document, Ipad, Jewelry and Passport
feature_bullets: ✅ SUPERIOR FIRE PROTECTION: Made of high quality Liquid Silicone Coated Retardant-fiberglass exterior. which can withstand temperatures as high as 700℃ (approximately 1292℉), so you can keep all your valuables 100% safe, this document pouch brings peace of mind in case of a fire or burglary. Works great if you need to leave for a weather emergency quickly also. Remember it is for those just in case moments.

✅ NON-ITCHY SILICONE FIBERGLASS PROTECTION - Not only does bag keep your valuables protected, but your hands as well! You should never have to worry about wearing a pair a gloves to avoid getting painful splinters when adding or removing items from your fireproof bag, and made sure bag met that expectation. The entire exterior is infused with a thick layer of smooth silicone for safe handling.

✅ PRACTICAL AND CONVENIENCE: Simply insert your valuables into the bag and zip up, For greatest protection, store in a lower level of your home or office. At 10.5"x6.9" it is very roomy but not bulky giving you space for birth certificates, titles, social security cards, and passports, then leaving room for jewelry and other valuables as well.

✅ WATER RESISTANT - Not only does fireproof bag stand up against fire, but it's also highly water resistant just in case it gets wet for any reason, suitable for both men and women. It is also the best choice for gifts.

✅ SAFE TO USE AND GUARANTEE: fiberglass bag is made from safe high quality products, giving you the confidence to handle it with total peace of mind. Keep your valuables nice and safe with the heaviest duty fireproof bag around.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars746 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
